rooms.description: Spacious entrance with a traditional Chettinad style archway leading into the living space.
Open-plan living area with decorative elements inspired by local heritage, suitable for family gatherings.
Functional modern kitchen integrated into the living space, designed to meet local building norms and safety codes.
Adjacent dining space that flows with the living area for ease of hosting guests.
Primary bedroom on the ground floor ensuring privacy and quiet, adhering to Vastu principles by positioning it in the north-east sector for positive energy.
ensuite bathroom with traditional finishes and modern plumbing systems.
Personal gym space designed in a corner of the villa to promote health and wellness, ensuring quiet operation with soundproofing measures.
